GS40samapviu:675: śītaṃ varṇabalapradaṃ samadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ hi saṃgrāhakaṃ
GS40samapviu:686: vahner vṛddhiharaṃ vipākamadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca śītaṃ sadā

GS40samapviu:698: māhiṣyaṃ tan mānuṣaṇāṃ ca śastaṃ balyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ bastisādaṃ karoti /

GS40samapviu:707: sadya eṣa balapuṣṭikaraṃ syād uṣṭrajaṃ śvayathukāsakaraṃ ca //
GS40samapviu:716: kaphe 'nile yonidoṣe ca śvayathau hatam (śophe kampe ca tad dhitam) // 9 //
GS40samapviu:719: dīpanī (naṃ) laghu vīrye ca vidyād aikaśaphaṃ ghṛtam // 10 //

GS40samapviu:733: yad vedāgamavedibhir nigaditaṃ sākṣād ihāyur nṛṇāṃ

GS40samapviu:737: vīryātiśītaṃ ca guṇe vipāke svādu tridoṣeṣu rasāyanaṃ ca /

GS40samapviu:748: sarveṣāṃ sarvadaiva prathitaguṇagaṇaṃ sādhu pathyaṃ ghṛtaṃ syāt // 17 //
GS40samapviu:762: nirāmayānāṃ navayauvanānāṃ kṛtvā gavāṃ yacchata dhautamaddhiḥ /

GS40samapviu:766: uṣṇaṃ vipāke kaṭukaṃ satiktaṃ kaphāpahaṃ vātanivāraṇaṃ ca /

GS40samapviu:770: balakṛtkaphavātajaṃ ca [jantu] kharjū vraṇakaṇḍūtiharaṃ ca [kānti] dāyi // 2 //
GS40samapviu:771: kaṇḍūharaṃ kāntivivardhanaṃ ca arśo [varco] vivṛddhi vraṇaropaṇaṃ ca /

GS40samapviu:773: na pittaroge na ca śoṇitotthe pathyaṃ mahāvātavikārasaṃdhau /

GS40samapviu:776: pāmādidoṣāpaharaṃ ca tailaṃ abhyañjanaṃ sarṣapasaṃbhavaṃ ca // 5 //
GS40samapviu:778: tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ picchalaṃ visraṃ raktair aṇḍodbhavaṃ tv ati {cf. Aṣṭāṅgahṛdaya 5.58cd} // 6 //
GS40samapviu:783: kharjūś ca keśaś ca karoti koṣṭhe [kaṇḍūṃ ca karoti dṛṣṭeḥ]
GS40samapviu:788: ākṣaṃ svādu himaṃ keśyaṃ guru pittānilāpaham /

GS40samapviu:821: tadvat sakṛṣṇo hi bhaved guṇaiś ca vṛṣyo bhavet tarpaṇadāhahantā /

GS40samapviu:876: agrabhāge punas tasya ikṣoḥ syāl lavaṇo laghu // 20 //

GS40samapviu:1023: pānīyaṃ syāt kṛṣṇamṛtsnāsam etaṃ kṣīrājyādau gavyam ādau praśastam //

GS40samapviu:1067: kaṭur vipāke madhuraś ca śimbiḥ pravṛddhaviṇmūtra (mā)

GS40samapviu:1076: tileṣu sarpiṣv asita [sarveṣv asitaḥ] pradhāno medhyaḥ sito hīnataras tathānyaḥ //
GS40samapviu:1079: grāhyuṣṇo dhṛtikṛt kaṣāyamadhuras tikto vipāke kaṭuḥ
GS40samapviu:1083: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuro himaś ca kaṭur vipāke kaphapittahāraḥ /
GS40samapviu:1084: vraṇeṣu pathyas tilavac ca nityaṃ prabaddhamūtro bahuvātavarśa [rcā]ḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1086: medomaruttṛṭ [ḍ] haraṇo virūkṣaḥ prasādanaḥ śoṇitapittayoś ca // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1087: ebhir guṇair hīnamataś ca nityaṃ vidyād yavebhyo 'nyatha [ya] vānaśeṣaḥ /

GS40samapviu:1090: prasṛṣṭavarco 'nyayavaḥ sabalyo balyaś ca vṛṣyaś ca male hitaś ca // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1091: śītaḥ kaṣāyaḥ surasaś ca rūkṣo mehakrimiśleṣmaviṣāpahaś ca /
GS40samapviu:1092: mādhuryayukto balavāṃs tathaiva pittāpaho veṇuyavaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // 4 //
GS40samapviu:1095: godhūma ukto madhuro guruś ca balyaḥ sthiraḥ śukrarucipradaś ca
GS40samapviu:1096: snigdho '[ti] si śīto 'nilapītahārī [pittahantā] saṃdhānakṛcchrāśmaharaḥ saraś ca // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1098: balyaḥ śītakaraḥ saro rucikaraḥ saṃdhānakārī guruḥ /

GS40samapviu:1102: kaṭur vipāke kaṭukaḥ kaphaghno vidāhako vātaharaḥ kusumbhaḥ //
GS40samapviu:1105: uṣṇas tathā svāduraso 'nilaghnaḥ pittolbaṇaḥ syāt kaṭuko vipāke /
GS40samapviu:1106: pāke rase vāpi kaṭuḥ pradiṣṭaḥ siddhārthakaḥ śoṇitapittakartā // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1112: yā [pā]mākuṣṭhabhagandareṣu na tathā rucyās tu pathyā bhṛśam // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1114: tasyaitad vidaṃ [vidhaṃ] bhojyaṃ svādu viṣṭambhanaṃ guru /
GS40samapviu:1124: pittajvarātiśamanaṃ laghumudga[yū] pūṣaṃ saṃtāpahāri tad arocakanāśanaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:1125: raktaprasādanam idaṃ yadi saindhavena yuktaṃ tadā bhavati sarvarujāpahāri // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1126: vyapagatamaladoṣāḥ prāṇinaḥ kṣīṇamātrā adhikataratṛṣārtā ye ca dharmaprataptāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1127: jvalanamukhavidagdhā ye 'tisārābhibhūtāḥ punar iha manujās te mudupū [yū]ṣasya yogyāḥ // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1129: vīrye colāḥ [ṣṇāḥ] kulitthāḥ kaphapavanaharāḥ pittaraktapradāś ca
GS40samapviu:1137: sarve pittavikārajeṣu [vi] hitā hṛdyāś ca māsūryakāḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1151: balyā varṇakarā vibhuktacaṇakāḥ puṃsaś ca naite hitāḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1171: śyāmākāḥ kodravā ye 'nye ye cānye 'nu ca śimbikāḥ /

GS40samapviu:1173: yad yaj jīryaty atikṣipraṃ tat tal laghutaraṃ smṛtam /

GS40samapviu:1182: salaghurucirakāmā pheṇikātipraśastā balayati laghujīrā chardināśaṃ karoti /
GS40samapviu:1186: guravo bṛṃhaṇāḥ snigdhā balyāḥ śukrakarāḥ parāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1189: toyājyena vimarditaṃ samasitaṃ kṛtvā sutaptaṃ tathā
GS40samapviu:1190: khaṇḍājyena paced dhutāśanamṛdau kṛtvā subandhaṃ tataḥ /
GS40samapviu:1192: puṣpālambam iti bruvanti munayo nāmnā mahāmodakam // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1193: vṛṣyās tu kandarpakarā yathāgni saṃvardhitāḥ prītirucipradāyakāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1194: vātaṃ sapittaṃ praharanti bhuktāḥ sanmodakā modakarā narāṇām // 4 //
GS40samapviu:1196: modako gurur atīva vṛṣyakaḥ śleṣmalaś ciravipākatas tathā /
GS40samapviu:1200: śamayati bahu pittaṃ śleṣmakopaṃ karoti janayati jaṭharāgniṃ vātarogān nihanti /
GS40samapviu:1201: suratajanitakhedaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva hanyād amṛtaphalam udāraṃ cāru śaṃsanti khe (vai)dyāḥ // 6 //
GS40samapviu:1202: śamayaty arśaḥkṛcchrān harati savātaṃ tathā pittam // 7 //
GS40samapviu:1204: rucyā balyā balamalakarā hṛdyagandhā sthirā ca

GS40samapviu:1212: vṛṣyakā rocakā balyā guravaḥ syuḥ svayonivat // 9 //
GS40samapviu:1223: hanti vātaṃ raktapittaṃ śleṣmalaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
GS40samapviu:1228: susnigdhā vaṭikā ca dugdhamṛditā kāntyai ca saukhyapradā
GS40samapviu:1230: pittāsraṃ ca vināśayet tu satataṃ bhakṣyā supuṣṭipradā
GS40samapviu:1237: mūdgajātās tu ye kecit laghavo rucikārakāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1244: rājīcūrṇe vimiśraḥ kaphapavanaharo rocano dīpanaḥ syān
GS40samapviu:1246: kiṃ vā toyair vimiśro guḍalavaṇayutaḥ pittaraktādihantā
GS40samapviu:1250: havā [?] takramanoharāś ca vaṭakās teṣāṃ ruciṃ mārdavaṃ
GS40samapviu:1251: svādaṃ saurabhabham udvahanty aharahaḥ tān vetti viśvambharā // 18 /
GS40samapviu:1260: piṣṭair māṣadalotthair vihitā vaṭakāś ca vaṭikāś ca // 20 //
